pages.text: Feeding Trought is a block that you can use to automatizate passive creatures breeding.$(br2)First you have to right click in the Feeding Trough, now fill it with food, like Wheat, Seeds or Carrots.
Nearby creatures which can be feeded with the food that you added will eat the food and then they will enter in a love mode.$(br2)Insert a picture of Feeding Trough
